T02D3318:14a-0: @14a # // skad cig gis 'jam dpal gyi rnal
T02D3318:14a-1: 'byor du dmigs nas lte bar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D3318:14a-2: gyi steng du thig le dkar po mar me'i rtse
T02D3318:14a-3: mo'i rnam pa'i 'od zer dang bcas pa bsams nas
T02D3318:14a-4: spyi gtsug tu gzhom du med pa'i yi ge ham
T02D3318:14a-5: dkar po mgo bo 'phyang bzhin pa'i 'od zer dang
T02D3318:14b-0: de nas thig le'i 'od @14b zer gyis bskul nas
T02D3318:14b-1: yi ge ham zhu bar gyur te thig le bsil
T02D3318:14b-3: sems brtan par gyur pa'i sngags pas ring por mi thogs par shes rab skye bar 'gyur ro //
T02D3318:14b-4: 'jam dpal shes rab kyi sbyor ba rdzogs so //
